author: malcolm
msg: Followup to r15061: stop ignoring errors returned by svn_wc_prop_list().
r15061 changed svn_wc_prop_list() so that it no longer returns an error if
the requested properties file does not exist.
Two of the existing callers of svn_wc_prop_list() ignore all errors returned
from that function because they want to ignore the case where the path no
longer exists in the working copy.  As of r15061, this is no longer necessary.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/diff.c
(load_base_props, change_dir_prop): Don't unconditionally ignore errors
returned from svn_wc_prop_list(), since a not-found condition no longer
returns an error.

author: malcolm
msg: * COMMITTERS
(malcolm): Add myself as a full committer, per instruction from Above.

author: cmpilato
msg: Cleanup some overlooked test cruft when doing 'make check-clean'.
Patch by: Malcolm Rowe <malcolm-svn-dev@farside.org.uk>
* Makefile.in
(check-clean): Also clean test repositories from the two directories
subversion/tests/{libsvn_fs, libsvn_ra_local}/.

author: kou
msg: Don't send e-mail when '--help' option is passed.
* tools/hook-scripts/commit-email.rb(parse): Use exit! instead of exit.

author: kou
msg: Handle '--help' option as special case.
Fix wrong URI.
* tools/hook-scripts/commit-email.rb
(main): Parse ARGV as options directly when ARGV has '--help' option.
(diff_info): Remove @REV from URI.
